name: Palco
description: Minimal caching plugin for Anfiteatro. Provides simple key-value storage.
overview: Palco is a lightweight caching plugin that stores arbitrary JSON data by key. Use it for caching API responses, reviews, or any data that Anfiteatro needs to persist on the server.

versions.changelog: Fixed DI service resolution issue. CacheService now accessed via Plugin singleton instead of relying on IPluginServiceRegistrator. Added lazy initialization for better resilience.
Fixed DI service registration - CacheService now properly resolved with IApplicationPaths and ILogger dependencies.
Improved error handling throughout all endpoints. All endpoints now have try-catch with proper logging and graceful fallbacks instead of 500 errors.
Add public registration endpoints for Anfiteatro user registration system. Allows unauthenticated access to registration-enabled check and registration request submission.
Initial release - Simple SQLite-backed key-value cache with TTL support.
